Tweets in Welsh

Learning to read Welsh, one tweet at a time...

Ymunwch gyda ni am 3 o'r gloch prynhawn fory am sgwrs a set arbennig gyda Mared yn ein Gig CARTREF Gwaelod nesaf draw ar dudalen Facebook Gigs Cantre'r Gwaelod ‚≠êÔ∏è pic.twitter.com/jYvTrzct0j

— gigscantrergwaelod (@gigsgcg) June 13, 2020

FIRST ATTEMPT

....with us at 3 o clock in the afternoon..for conversation and a set...with Mared in our next Gwaelod Home Gig ... through our ....Facebook Gigs Cantre'r Gwaelod

CORRECT TRANSLATION

Join us at 3 o clock tomorrow afternoon for a conversation and special set with Mared in our next Gwaelod Home Gig through our Facebook Gigs Cantre'r Gwaelod page

WORDS LEARNED

Ymunwch gyda ni am 3 o'r gloch prynhawn fory am sgwrs a set arbennig gyda Mared yn ein Gig CARTREF Gwaelod nesaf draw ar dudalen Facebook Gigs Cantre'r Gwaelod ‚≠êÔ∏è pic.twitter.com/jYvTrzct0j

— gigscantrergwaelod (@gigsgcg) June 13, 2020

FIRST ATTEMPT

....with us at 3 o clock in the afternoon..for conversation and a set...with Mared in our next Gwaelod Home Gig ... through our ....Facebook Gigs Cantre'r Gwaelod

CORRECT TRANSLATION

Join us at 3 o clock tomorrow afternoon for a conversation and special set with Mared in our next Gwaelod Home Gig through our Facebook Gigs Cantre'r Gwaelod page

WORDS LEARNED

Ymunwch gyda ni - join us

dudalen - page

arbenning - special

Am ragor o wybodaeth, ewch i https://t.co/pOsglIJ9TV #CadwCymrunDdiogel pic.twitter.com/kOiZAhihPj

— Cyngor Caerdydd (@cyngorcaerdydd) June 6, 2020

FIRST ATTEMPT

Bike week is here! @Wearecyclinguk....course...for you....fun...safe... daily practice To..come to orlo.uk/Sbs2r KeepWalesSafe

CORRECT TRANSLATION

Bike week is back! To celebrate, @Wearecyclinguk is running a series of fun online events for you to take part locally and safely as part of your daily practice. For more information, visit....

WORDS LEARNED

ddathlu - celebrate

ar-lein - online

rhan - part

O‚Äôr Morglawdd, i Barc Bute a thu hwnt mae mwy a mwy bobl yn defnyddio parciau a mannau gwyrdd #Caerdydd i redeg, cerdded a beicio ‚Äì llawer iawn o bobl at ei gilydd.

Cofiwch am eraill i #CadwCaerdyddynDdiogel drwy sicrhau ymbellhau cymdeithasol. pic.twitter.com/CXj2QX7xRj

— Cyngor Caerdydd (@cyngorcaerdydd) June 13, 2020

FIRST ATTEMPT

From the ... to Bute Park ..., more and more people are....parking and...green Cardiff to run, walk and bike - lots very of people.... Remember to ..to KeepCardiff......

CORRECT TRANSLATION

From the Barrrage to Bute Park and beyond, more and more people are using Cardiff's parks and green spaces to run, walk and bike - lots of people together. Remember others and KeepCardiffSafe by maintaining social distancing.

WORDS LEARNED

Morglawdd - Barrage

defnyddio - using

a thu hwnt - and beyond

Rydym ni am glywed eich profiadau a‚Äôch teimladau o fyw yng Nghymru yn ystod pandemig #covid19

Trwy ateb ein holiadur, bydd eich stori chi yn dod yn rhan o‚Äôr casgliad cenedlaethol

üëâ https://t.co/yDz8fIH58Y#CasgluCofid #AmgueddfaAdref pic.twitter.com/WMftCJBOUC

— Amgueddfa Caerdydd (@Museum_Cardiff) June 13, 2020

FIRST ATTEMPT

We ... live in Wales...pandemic COVID19. ..your story...

CORRECT TRANSLATION

We want to hear your experiences and feelings of living in Wales during the covid19 pandemic. By answering our questionnaire, your story will become part of the national collection

WORDS LEARNED

Rydym ni am glywed eich - We want to hear your

profiadau - experiences

yn ystod - during
